personals.title: Savings & Investments
personals.content: We are passionate about investments. Let us guide you to sufficiently save and optimally invest your money.  Our professional advice will make your dreams a reality.
personals.collapse1c: Government encourages savings and therefore initiated tax-free savings accounts that enable you to invest up to R30 000 per tax year that will be free of interest, capital gains and dividend tax.
personals.collapse2c:
For your individual savings and discretionary investments we help you to find cost-effective solutions. We are passionate about investments. Let us guide you to sufficiently save and optimally invest your money. Our professional advice will make your dreams a reality.

We help you to understand how much to save in Tax Free Savings accounts and how much to save in pure unit trusts or exchange traded funds. If you have a high risk tolerance and want to invest aggressively, we help you set up a portfolio that will position your assets for optimal growth and wealth accumulation.
personals.collapse3c: Pre-school, primary school, high school, university. Saving for education is critical as such costs has skyrocketed. Planning for your children’s education can be a daunting task. We assist you to plan ahead and sufficiently save to ensure they have a prosperous future.
personals.collapse4c: If you are a sophisticated investor who, like us, has a passion for investments, we assist you to set up a cost-effective portfolio where you can trade directly in shares. This allows you to personally be involved in the management of your investments.
personals.collapse5c: We think and act global and can help you to diversify your investments globally. Let us assist you on the most suitable ways to invest in global markets, be it developed or developing countries. You can benefit from our previous offshore management experience as well as our in-depth analysis as performed for our institutional investors.
personals.collapse6c: If you are a sophisticated investor who wishes to use derivatives to optimally manage your risk, we help you to implement protection solutions that meet your needs.

personals.title: Retirement Planning
personals.quote: Someone is sitting in the shade today, because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
personals.content: Saving for retirement is an on-going financial journey. Our professional guidance and advice removes the uncertainty of the unknown and ensure that you can sleep well at night. Your retirement should be something you look forward to.
personals.items: Too many people start investing too late or too little at unnecessary high costs and at insufficient levels of risk. We help you invest your money at an appropriate level of risk in a cost-effective structure that provides optimal tax benefits. Let us assist you to plan ahead:
personals.collapse1c: It is never too early to start saving for retirement. Pre-retirement planning mostly takes the form of a lump sum investment or a continuous monthly contribution. The secret is to be committed to continuous contributions and to implement the most appropriate risk profiled investment solution.
personals.collapse2c: This is for individuals who are retrenched or moving jobs. We assist you to retain your current retirement plan and to stay on track. The secret is to not delve into your savings.
personals.collapse3c: If you are retired or about to retire we assist you to invest what you have accumulated up to now to provide you with a monthly income that will sustain your lifestyle, without outliving your savings.
personals.cta: <u>Contact us</u> today to meet a financial planner to ensure a worry-free retirement.

personals.title: Estate Planning
personals.quote: “In this world nothing can be said to be certain, except death and taxes.” – Benjamin Franklin
personals.content:
Taxes at death are a reality, but how much are we talking about? The taxes and administration costs at death can be significant and impact your heir’s inheritance if you do not structure it in the most effective manner.

We assist you with:
personals.items:
• Setting up a will
  • Reviewing your existing will
  • Calculating the taxes and costs applicable to your estate on death
  • Reviewing the liquidity of your estate
  • Providing recommendations regarding any shortcomings
personals.cta: <u>Contact us</u> today to meet a financial planner to ensure your loved ones are looked after well.

personals.title: Risk Cover
personals.quote: No one can predict the future or unfortunate events such as death and disability, however, we can position you to be protected against potential losses and minimize the impact thereof.
personals.items:
• Life cover
  • Disability cover
  • Critical illness cover
  • Educational cover
  • Income protection
personals.post-content: Additionally, we can guide you to be sure your medical aid and short term insurance are sufficient to protect your family and your lifestyle.
